§ Kaahmaah

⸺ by Charles Iliya Krempeaux

In the [[world-18]] //animation// and //fictional world//, **Kaahmaah** is one of the [[world-18-characters]].

**Kaahmaah** is a [[sabzii]].

**Kaahmaah** is usually called by the title [[green-mann]].
He inherited the title from his father.

§§ Family

**Kaahmaah** is the youngest of 7 children — and has 6 older brothers.
